---
title: "Matthew"
---
**The Changed Outsider**

**Strengths:** Detail-oriented, reflective, redeemed

**Role in God’s Story:** A former tax collector turned disciple, Matthew shows that grace rewrites your story. He documents Jesus’ life with care, emphasizing His authority and compassion.

**Where he shows up in the Gospels:**

* [Matthew 9:9–13](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Matthew+9%3A9-13&version=NIV) – Called by Jesus and hosts a dinner for other outsiders
* [Matthew 10:1–4](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Matthew+10%3A1-4&version=NIV) – Listed among the twelve apostles
